title: Deals: Samsung Gold Box takes up to $400 off Galaxy foldables, Buds 2 hit $110, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are now up for the taking and headlined by up to $400 off Samsung folding smartphones. That’s alongside Galaxy Buds 2 at $110 and a spring discount on Fitbit Versa 3 at $51 off. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Gold Box takes up to $400 off Galaxy foldables, Buds 2 hit $110, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung folding smartphones now up to $400 off in today's limited-time Gold Box sale. Plus the Galaxy Buds 2 with ANC at $110 and more.
